Judul: BUILDING BACK BETTER AFTER THE TSUNAMI: THE EVALUATION AND LESSONS LEARNED FROM BRR NAD-NIAS HOUSING AND SETTLEMENT PROGRAM
Abstrak:
ABSTRACT:   
 
 

Indonesia faces the monumental task of rebuilding the region stricken by an 8.9 Richter scale earthquake which followed by a 24 meters high tsunami on 26 December 2004. Tsunami swept along killing hundred thousands, destroying buildings, infrastructure, and paralyzing the economy
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing:
Pembimbing 1: Kuntoro Mangkusubroto, Dr, Ir, MSc
